# Agent Skills Index
URL_TEMPLATE: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/{repo}/main/skills/{path}/SKILL.md
COLUMNS: id;repo;path;summary

## CATEGORIES (ROUTING)
- ai-llm: ./llms/categories/ai-llm.txt (800/1486 skills)
- business: ./llms/categories/business.txt (211/211 skills)
- data: ./llms/categories/data.txt (394/394 skills)
- design: ./llms/categories/design.txt (218/218 skills)
- dev: ./llms/categories/dev.txt (800/1456 skills)
- devops: ./llms/categories/devops.txt (518/518 skills)
- other: ./llms/categories/other.txt (92/92 skills)
- product: ./llms/categories/product.txt (107/107 skills)
- productivity: ./llms/categories/productivity.txt (130/130 skills)
- research: ./llms/categories/research.txt (177/177 skills)
- security: ./llms/categories/security.txt (301/301 skills)
- web: ./llms/categories/web.txt (659/659 skills)
